org.apache.accumulo.core.client.lexicoder

Class IntegerLexicoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.accumulo.core.client.lexicoder.IntegerLexicoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Encoder<Integer>, Lexicoder<Integer>, TypedValueCombiner.Encoder<Integer>

    public class IntegerLexicoder
extends Object
implements Lexicoder<Integer>
    A lexicoder for signed integers. The encoding sorts Integer.MIN_VALUE first and Integer.MAX_VALUE last. The encoding sorts -2 before -1. It corresponds to the sort order of Integer.
    Since:
    1.6.0
